ta.title: லிட்ரோ எரிவாயு விலைகள் கீழே
body_lines: லிட்ரோ கேஸ் கம்பெனி கூறுகையில், நள்ளிரவில் இருந்து எரிவாயு விலையை குறைக்க எடுக்கப்பட்ட விலைகள் (04).

en.title: Litro gas prices down
body_lines: Litro Gas Company says that the prices taken to reduce gas prices from midnight (04).
Accordingly, a 12.5 kilogram gas cylinder has been reduced by Rs.
The price of a 5kg gas cylinder has been reduced by Rs. 1,525 million.
A 2.3 kilogram gas cylinder has been reduced by Rs.

summary_lines: Litro Gas Company reduced prices from midnight: a 12.5 kg cylinder dropped, 5kg by Rs. 1,525 million, and a 2.3 kg cylinder also saw a decrease.
